class.name: ManyBoneIK3D
class.brief_description: A general inverse kinematics system with constraints.
class.description: The ManyBoneIK3D class provides a comprehensive system for inverse kinematics (IK) with support for various constraints. It allows for complex IK setups involving multiple bones, each with their own constraints and parameters.

method.name: find_constraint
method.description: Returns the index of the constraint with the given name. If no such constraint exists, returns -1.

method.name: get_bone_count
method.description: Returns the total number of bones in the IK system.

method.name: get_constraint_count
method.description: Returns the total number of constraints in the IK system.

method.name: get_constraint_name
method.description: Returns the name of the constraint at the specified index.

method.name: get_kusudama_open_cone_center
method.description: Returns the center of the limit cone for the kusudama at the specified index.

method.name: get_kusudama_open_cone_count
method.description: Returns the count of limit cones for the kusudama at the specified index.

method.name: get_kusudama_open_cone_radius
method.description: Returns the radius of the limit cone for the kusudama at the specified index.

method.name: get_pin_count
method.description: Returns the total number of pins in the IK system.

method.name: get_pin_direction_priorities
method.description: Returns the direction priorities of the pin at the specified index.

method.name: get_pin_enabled
method.description: Returns whether the pin at the specified index is enabled or not.

method.name: get_pin_motion_propagation_factor
method.description: Returns the passthrough factor of the pin at the specified index.

method.name: get_pin_weight
method.description: Returns the weight of the pin at the specified index.

method.name: queue_print_skeleton
method.description: Queues a print operation for the skeleton structure. Useful for debugging.

method.name: register_skeleton
method.description: Registers the skeleton to the IK system. This should be called after all bones and constraints have been added to the system.

method.name: reset_constraints
method.description: Resets all constraints in the IK system to their default state.

method.name: set_constraint_count
method.description: Sets the total number of constraints.

method.name: set_dirty
method.description: Marks the IK system as dirty, indicating that it needs to be updated. This should be called whenever a significant change is made to the system.

method.name: set_effector_bone_name
method.description: Sets the name of the bone at the specified pin index.

method.name: set_kusudama_open_cone_center
method.description: Sets the center of the limit cone for the kusudama at the specified index.

method.name: set_kusudama_open_cone_count
method.description: Sets the count of limit cones for the kusudama at the specified index.

method.name: set_kusudama_open_cone_radius
method.description: Sets the radius of the limit cone for the kusudama at the specified index.

method.name: set_pin_direction_priorities
method.description: Sets the direction priorities of the pin at the specified index.

method.name: set_pin_motion_propagation_factor
method.description: Sets the passthrough factor of the pin at the specified index.

method.name: set_pin_weight
method.description: Sets the weight of the pin at the specified index.

members.member: A boolean value indicating whether the IK system is in constraint mode or not.

The default maximum number of radians a bone is allowed to rotate per solver iteration. The lower this value, the more natural the pose results. However, this will increase the number of iterations_per_frame the solver requires to converge.
The number of iterations performed by the solver per frame.
The number of stabilization passes performed by the solver. This can help to improve the stability of the IK solution.
The index of the bone currently selected in the user interface.
